scripts.test: npm run elevate && npm run build && npm run install && node test/main.test.js && npm run clean
scripts.dev: npm run elevate && npm run build && npm run install && npm create octobox-app && npm run clean
scripts.build: tsc --project tsconfig.json && minify bin/index.max.js > bin/index.js && rimraf bin/index.max.js && chmod u+x bin/index.js || exit 0
scripts.clean: sudo npm -g uninstall create-octobox-app || npm -g uninstall create-octobox-app
scripts.install: npm run clean && sudo npm link || npm link
